data.title: Burkina Faso Population, 1960
data.meta_description: In 2023, population for Burkina Faso was 23.3 million persons. Over the last 50 years, population of Burkina Faso grew substantially from 6.02 million to 23.3 million persons rising at an increasing annual rate that reached a maximum of 3.20% in 2005 and then decreased to 2.55% in 2023. Total population is based on the de facto definition of population, which counts all residents regardless of legal status or citizenship--except for refugees not permanently settled in the country of asylum, who are generally considered part of the population of their country of origin. The values shown are midyear estimates.
data.text:
What is population?

Total population is based on the de facto definition of population, which counts all residents regardless of legal status or citizenship--except for refugees not permanently settled in the country of asylum, who are generally considered part of the population of their country of origin. The values shown are midyear estimates.
